name: generator-yeogurt
description: A “Choose your own adventure” generator for creating static sites and single page applications. Helps you harness the power of your favorite tools: Angular, React + Flux, Backbone, Jade, Swig, Express, Grunt and much more!

scripts.test: istanbul cover _mocha -- test/app/*.test.js test/subgenerators/angular/*.test.js test/subgenerators/backbone/*.test.js test/subgenerators/react/*.test.js test/subgenerators/static/*.test.js --reporter list --timeout 100000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.localtest: mocha test/app/*.test.js test/subgenerators/angular/*.test.js test/subgenerators/backbone/*.test.js test/subgenerators/react/*.test.js test/subgenerators/static/*.test.js -b --reporter spec
scripts.localtest-report: istanbul cover _mocha test/app/*.test.js test/subgenerators/angular/*.test.js test/subgenerators/backbone/*.test.js test/subgenerators/react/*.test.js test/subgenerators/static/*.test.js && open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html
